headline: Did Margin Pressures and Profit Drop Just Shift Lennar's (LEN) Investment Narrative?
summary: Lennar Corporation reported third-quarter results with net income nearly halved to US$590.97 million and revenue of US$8.81 billion, alongside a declared quarterly dividend of US$0.50 per share and ongoing share repurchases. This period highlighted rising profitability challenges linked to lower home prices and squeezed margins, triggering analyst downgrades amid persistent affordability concerns and elevated mortgage rates. With Lennar signaling cautious guidance and continued margin...
